file_content.text: System errors detected. Hardware errors detected. Activating defense systems.
We got problems. Turn around.
Cacophony. Something is wrong.
Sir--something's approaching.
Cipher. I think we have a visitor.
A life-form is approaching. The ship calls to it.
You come for the Shining Man. Come for his machine that fell from the stars.
He camped here three moons, studying ancient ways. Writing Voss scrolls. Writing Voss prophecies in blood and ink.
What's your name? How do you know about the Shining Man?
Who are you?
Xanar. Outcast. I saw him come. Look!
You're Gormak. I thought you couldn't speak our language.
You can speak Basic?
I speak as he did. Look!
Stay back. I've already killed plenty of Gormak.
Move and you're dead.
I am unlike any other. Outcast.
Only I saw him come here. Only I know his secrets.
I hold the memory of this star machine in my hand. The Shining Man corrupted it before he left, would have burned it. I saved it.
Gormak sliced the big bad conspirator computer with a rock and string.
A Gormak did what Intelligence couldn't. He sliced a conspirator computer.
You saved the Shining Man's data, beat his security....
The conspirators' security is nothing to sneer at. The Gormak are remarkable.
Your technique with computer systems is admirable.
Now we bargain for his records.
You have my attention. What do you want for the ship's data?
I'm open to bargaining.
Lives are at stake, and the Shining Man's data is nothing to toy with.
This isn't a game.
Stupid.
If that's really the ship's data, I could force you to give it up.
I can just take what I want.
Force me? Fight me! You cannot fight me.
The Shining Man arrives, walks in my land, steals my treasures. He makes me angry. Then I watch Shining Man shed skin and become Voss.
This is a great feat. He leaves for Voss shrine. I study his ways to learn his powers. You will take me to him so I can learn more.
The Shining Man is dead.
What do you mean, "study his ways"?
First, I want to know more.
His disciplines.
His stories preserved in the machine.
--the assassinations today of Senator Nehal and her aide--
From this day forth, I declare Tantra independent of--
--will bleed your systems dry. From now on, for every ship you--
A thousand lands serve him, but they do not know!
Now tell me where to find him!
He died.
I'm sorry, but he's buried below Voss-Ka. I found his ashes.
You lie! He was strong.
I need more before I'm convinced this bargain is worth it.
Show me another holo?
You do not know where he is.
I'm sorry, he's gone. After he met the Voss, he went back to the stars.
He left the planet.
That is a lie. He knew he would never leave Voss!
You die.
I appreciate you preserving his technology. But now you're just in the way.
You're insane. [Attack]
I kill you as the Shining Man kills.
